name: The Trial
description: Book tells the story of Josef K., a man arrested and prosecuted by a remote, inaccessible authority, with the nature of his crime revealed neither to him nor to the reader.

authors.name: Franz Kafka1
authors.description: a German-speaking Bohemian novelist and short-story writer, widely regarded as one of the major figures of 20th-century literature
